pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, April 20, 2017 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Itinerary for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Thursday, April 20, 2017:

Toronto, Ontario 

11:30 a.m. The Prime Minister will be interviewed by Bloomberg Editor-in-Chief John Micklethwait for the Bloomberg Businessweekâ€™s Debrief series.

AGO Art Gallery of Ontario
Baillie Court
317 Dundas Street West
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage restricted to press (no stills or video cameras).
  • Press should arrive no later than 11:00 a.m. and RSVP in advance to ttrippet@bloomberg.net
  • Pool video will be available on the NY Switch at BLM1 and in 1080/60i. Video is embargoed for use until 12:30 p.m. For any questions, contact Bloomberg Transmissions at 212-617-5066.
  • Portions of the interview will begin airing live at 11:30 a.m. on Bloomberg television.
  • Photos will be available at https://mediasource.bloomberg.com/
  • The livestream will air online at https://www.bloomberg.com/live/stream

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will host the Public Policy Forum's Testimonial Dinner.

Metro Toronto Convention Centre North
255 Front Street West
Toronto, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Open coverage.
  • Media should arrive no later than 5:00 p.m. and must register at front entrance.
